page.title: 06LEISURE/RECREATION, CWMBRAN
page.content: After interviewing adults and children about what they like doing in their spare time we had many different answers.Two broad groups formed physical exercise and hobbies.Some of the hobbies were stamp collecting , reading,cooking,sewing,listening to or playing music.Some people did physical exercise like jogging,badminton,keep- fit,swimming and many other sports.We asked questions like "Do you watch t.v. each evening?"Three hours was the average amount.Some people go to concerts or live shows at the local theatre others to adult classes at the local community centres.The sports stadium is very popular and famous because of its all-weather track. Exhibitions are held at Llantarnam Grange but in our survey we found that they are not well attended.In the Cwmbran area are 4 swimming-pools.
